name: Earache
description:
This is a project I made based off the song "Earache" by Mouse on the Keys. The first time I heard the song I instantly got ethereal cyberpunk visions in my head. Every time I listened to the song I kept getting the visions, so I decided to make it in Unity. This is my first Unity project, so it's not the greatest. I learned a lot though. It was worth time and I'm proud of it.

No interactive elements or gameplay.

None of the music belongs to me. All music belongs to Mouse on the Keys and their associated holders. I am simply a fan of their music and wanted to create a project with it.

All songs used by Mouse on the Keys

- I Shut My Eyes In Order To See

- Intro

- Earache
